Verses: 1 pinbu Avar Ennai Aalayaththin Vaasalukkuth Thirumbivarappanninaar; Idho, Vaasarpadiyin Keezhirundhu Thanneer Purappattuk Kizhakke Odugiradhaayirundhadhu; Aalayaththin Mugappu Kizhakku Nokkiyirundhadhu; Andhath Thanneer Aalayaththin Valadhupuramaaip Palipeedaththukkuth Therke Paaindhadhu.

2 avar Ennai Vadakku Vaasal Vazhiyaaip Purappadappanni, Ennai Veliyile Keezhththisaikku Edhiraana Puravaasalmattum Sutri Nadaththikkonduponaar; Ange Thanneer Valadhupuraththilirundhu Paaigiradhaayirundhadhu.
3 andhap Purushan Thamadhu Kaiyil Noolaip Pidiththukkondu, Kizhakke Purappadugaiyil Aayiramuzham Alandhu, Ennaith Thanneeraik Kadakkappanninaar; Thanneer Kanukkaal Alavaayirundhadhu.

4 pinnum Avar Aayiramuzham Alandhu, Ennaith Thanneeraik Kadakkappanninaar; Ange Thanneer Muzhankaal Alavaayirundhadhu; Pinnum Avar Aayiramuzham Alandhu Ennaik Kadakkappanninaar; Ange Thanneer Iduppalavaayirundhadhu.
5 pinnum Avar Aayiramuzham Alandhaar; Ange Adhu Naan Kadakkak Koodaadha Nadhiyaayirundhadhu; Thanneer Neechchaazhamum Kadakkamudiyaadha Nadhiyumaayirundhadhu.
6 avar Ennai Nokki: Manupuththirane, Idhaik Kandaayaa Endru Solli, Ennai Nadhiyoramaaith Thirumba Nadaththikkonduponaar.
7 naan Nadandhuvarugaiyil, Idho, Nadhiyoraththil Ikkaraiyilum Akkaraiyilum Vegu Thiralaana Virutchangal Irundhadhu.
8 avar Ennai Nokki: Indhath Thanneer Kizhakku Dhesaththukkup Purappattuppoi, Vanaandharavazhiyaai Odi Kadalil Vizhum; Idhu Kadalil Paaindhu, Vizhundhapinbu, Adhin Thanneer Aarokkiyamaagum.

9 sambavippadhu Ennavendraal, Indha Nadhi Pogumidamengum Sanjarikkum Jeevapraanigal Yaavum Pizhaikkum; Indhath Thanneer Ange Vandhapadiyinaal Vegu Eraalamaana Machchangalum Undaayirukkum; Indha Nadhipogumidamengumulla Yaavum Aarokkiyappattup Pizhaikkum.

10 appozhudhu Enkedhithuvakki Eneklaayimmattum Meenpidikkiravargal Adhin Karaiyile Nirpaargal; Adhellaam Valaigalai Virikkira Sthalamaayirukkum; Adhin Machchangal Periya Samuththiraththin Machchangalaippola Pala Jaadhiyum Magaa Eraalamumaayirukkum.
11 aanaalum Adhinudaiya Ulaiyaana Pallangalum Adhinudaiya Madukkalum Aarokkiyamaagaamal, Uppaagave Vittuvidappadum.

12 nadhiyoramaai Adhin Ikkaraiyilum Akkaraiyilum Pusippukkaana Sagalavidha Virutchangalum Valarum; Avaigalin Ilaigal Udhirvadhumillai, Avaigalin Kanigal Keduvadhumillai; Avaigalukkup Paayum Thanneer Parisuththa Sthalaththilirundhu Paaigirapadiyinaal Maadhandhorum Pudhukkanigalaik Koduththukkondeyirukkum, Avaigalin Kanigal Pusippukkum Avaigalin Ilaigal Avizhdhaththukkumaanavaigal.

13 karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Neengal Isravelin Pannirandu Koththirangaludaiya Lakkaththinpadiye Dhesaththai Sudhandhariththukkondu Kurikkavendiya Ellaiyaavadhu: Yoseppukku Irandu Pangu Undu.

14 sagodharanode Sagodharanukku Saripangu Undaaga Adhai Sudhandhariththukkollakkadaveergal; Adhai Ungal Pidhaakkalukkuk Koduppen Endru Naan Aanaiyittuk Koduththen; Aagaiyaal Ungalukku Indha Dhesam Sudhandharamaagak Kidaikkum.
15 dhesaththin Ellaiyaavadhu: Vadapuram Periya Samuththiranthuvakki, Sedhaadhukkup Pogira Edhlon Vazhiyaayirukkira,
16 aamaaththum, Peroththaavum, Thamaskuvin Ellaikkum Aamaaththin Ellaikkum Naduvaana Sipraayimum, Aabraanin Ellaiyode Serndha Aadhsaar Aththeekonumaanadhu.
17 appadiye Samuththiraththilirundhu Pogira Ellai Aadhsaarenaanum, Thamaskuvin Ellaiyum, Vadamoolaiyaana Vadakkum Aamaaththin Ellaiyumaanadhu; Idhu Vadapuram.

18 keezhppuraththai Aabraanukkum Thamaskuvukkum Naduvaagavum, Keeleyaaththukkum Yordhaanin Oramaana Isravel Dhesaththukkum Naduvaagavum Keezhkkadalmattum Irukkum Ellaiyaai Alappeergalaaga; Idhu Keezhppuram.
19 thenmoolaiyaana Thenpuram Thaamaar Thuvakki, Kaadhesilulla Sandaimoottudhalin Thanneergalmattaagavum, Aarumattaagavum, Periya Samuththiramattaagavum Iruppadhu, Idhu Thenmoolaiyaana Thenpuram.
20 merpuram Andha Ellaithuvakki Aamaaththukku Edhiraaga Vandhu Serumattum Irukkira Periya Samuththirame; Idhu Merpuram.
21 indha Dhesaththai Neengal Isravel Koththirangalinpadiye Ungalukkulle Pangittukkolveergalaaga.

22 ungalukkum, Ungalukkulle Thangi Ungalukkulla Pillaigalaip Perugira Anniyargalukkum, Neengal Adhai Seettuppottu Sudhandharamaakkikkolveergalaaga; Ivargal Ungalukku Isravel Puththiraril Pirandhavargalaippola Irundhu, Ungalodekooda Isravel Koththirangalin Naduve Sudhandharaththukku Udanpaduvaargalaaga.
23 anniyan Endhak Koththiraththode Thangiyirukkiraano, Adhile Avanudaiya Sudhandharaththai Avanukkuk Kodukkakkadaveergal Endru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.
